title: Approom
developerAddress:
特定商取引法に基づき、現在の有効な住所は有料アプリ・オプション購入者からの開示請求があった場合にのみ遅滞なく開示いたします。

description: If you find your favorite app, would you like to recommend it to your friends and family?Approom can do it in a very easily!Supported ways:- Android beam (Bring the device of each other)- QR Code- URLv2.2Support for Android Wear :)Your watch will be nice shared machine.QR Code is registered trademarks of DENSO WAVE INCORPORATED in Japan and in other countries.
descriptionHTML:
If you find your favorite app, would you like to recommend it to your friends and family?Approom can do it in a very easily!

Supported ways:
- Android beam (Bring the device of each other)
- QR Code
- URL

v2.2
Support for Android Wear :)
Your watch will be nice shared machine.


QR Code is registered trademarks of DENSO WAVE INCORPORATED in Japan and in other countries.
comments: Not entirely sure how to get qr codes but the app looks really nice..
recentChanges: Hi! It's been a long time since I updated the app.
